mapper.select: select modelNumber as model_number, manufacture, description, bpfo, bpfi, bsf, ftf from Bearing
mapper.insert: insert into BEARING_MST_PDM (RAWID, MODEL_NUMBER, MANUFACTURE, BPFO, BPFI, BSF, FTF, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DTTS, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DTTS) values (seq_bearing_mst_pdm.nextval, #{model_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bpfo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{bpfi,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{bsf,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{ftf,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'SYSTEM', SYSTIMESTAMP, 'SYSTEM', SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select:
select idnode as area_id, nodename as name, idparent as parent_id, nodedescription as description
from node where nodetype = 0 and treetype = 1
mapper.insert: insert into AREA_MST_PDM (RAWID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PARENT_RAWID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DTTS, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DTTS) values (#{area_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{parent_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 'SYSTEM', SYSTIMESTAMP, 'SYSTEM', SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: select d.idnode as area_id ,d.nodename as area_name, c.idnode as eqp_id, replace(c.nodename,',','_') as name, c.idparent as area_id, c.nodedescription as description, c.sortorderid as sort_order, 'SKF' as data_type from node c join node d on c.idparent=d.idnode where c.nodetype = 1 and c.treetype = 1 and d.nodetype=0 and d.treetype=1
select a.idnode as eqp_id, b.filedata as image from nodepicture a join picture b on a.idpicture = b.idpicture join node c on a.idnode = c.idnode where c.treetype = 1 and c.nodetype = 1

select a.idnode as param_id, a.nodename as name, a.idparent as eqp_id, a.nodedescription as description, a.sortorderid as sort_order, CASE a.nodetype WHEN '10201' THEN CASE RIGHT(a.nodename,3) WHEN '가속도' THEN 'Acceleration' ELSE 'Velocity' END WHEN '10202' THEN 'Enveloping' ELSE 'Speed' END AS param_type, rank() over (partition by a.idparent order by a.idnode) parse_index from node a join node b on a.idparent = b.idnode where a.nodetype in (10001, 10201, 10202) and a.treetype = 1 and b.nodetype = 1
select * from param_pdm where eqp_id=#{eqp_id}
mapper.insert: insert into PARAM_MST_PDM ( DATA_TYPE, RAWID, EQP_MST_RAWID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PARAM_TYPE_CD, UNIT_CD, PARSE_INDEX, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DTTS, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DTTS) values ('CONTINUOUS',#{param_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{eqp_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{param_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '-',#{parse_index,jdbcType=NUMERIC},'SYSTEM', SYSTIMESTAMP, 'SYSTEM', SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: select a.idnode as param_id, a.eu, a.eutype as eu_type from pointcommon a join node b on a.idnode = b.idnode join node c on b.idparent = c.idnode where b.treetype = 1 and b.nodetype in (10001, 10201, 10202) and c.nodetype = 1

select a.idnode as param_id, a.speed as rpm from PointSWSpeed a join node b on a.idnode = b.idnode join node c on b.idparent = c.idnode where b.treetype = 1 and b.nodetype in (10001, 10201, 10202) and c.nodetype = 1
mapper.insert: insert into MANUAL_RPM_MST_PDM ( RAWID, PARAM_MST_RAWID, RPM, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DTTS, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DTTS ) values ( seq_MANUAL_RPM_MST_PDM.nextval, #{param_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{rpm,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, 'SYSTEM', SYSTIMESTAMP, 'SYSTEM', SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: select aa.*, case when aa.pipe_index > 1 then substring(aa.spar1, 1, aa.pipe_index-1) else null end as manufacture, case when aa.pipe_index > 1 then substring(aa.spar1, aa.pipe_index+1, aa.spar_len-aa.pipe_index) else null end as model_number from ( select a.idmachinepart as part_id, a.partname as name, a.ratio, a.fpar1 as npar1, a.fpar2 as npar2, a.partorder as sort_order, a.idnode as eqp_id, a.parttype as part_type_id, a.idspeed as speed_param_id, case when a.parttype = 2 then charindex('|', a.spar1) else 0 end as pipe_index, case when a.parttype = 2 then len(a.spar1) else 0 end as spar_len, a.spar1 from machinepart a join node b on a.idnode = b.idnode where b.treetype = 1 ) aa
mapper.insert:
insert into parts_mst_pdm ( RAWID, EQP_MST_RAWID,
NAME, PARTS_TYPE_CD,
RATIO,
CREATE_BY, CREATE_DTTS, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DTTS) values ( #{part_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{eqp_id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'axis',
#{ratio,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
'SYSTEM', SYSTIMESTAMP, 'SYSTEM', SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select:
select d.idnode as area_id, d.nodename as area_name, c.idnode as eqp_id, c.nodename as eqp_name, a.idnode as param_id, b.nodename as param_name, a.TrendWarningF4 as warn, a.TrendAlarmF4 as alarm
from PointMasConVibration a join node b on a.idnode = b.idnode join node c on b.idparent = c.idnode join node d on c.idparent=d.idnode where b.treetype = 1 and b.nodetype in (10001, 10201, 10202) and c.nodetype = 1 and d.nodetype=0 and d.treetype=1 order by d.idnode, d.nodename, c.idnode, c.nodename

select d.idnode as area_id, d.nodename as area_name, c.idnode as eqp_id ,c.nodename as eqp_name
from PointMasConVibration a join node b on a.idnode = b.idnode join node c on b.idparent = c.idnode join node d on c.idparent=d.idnode where b.treetype = 1 and b.nodetype in (10001, 10201, 10202) and c.nodetype = 1 and d.nodetype=0 and d.treetype=1 group by d.idnode, d.nodename, c.idnode, c.nodename order by d.idnode, d.nodename, c.idnode, c.nodename

select idnode as param_id, dateadd(hour,9,alarmdate) as alarm_dtts, max(case when alarmstatus > 256 then -2 else alarmstatus end) as status_cd, max(currentvalue) as value, max(alarmlevel) as lvl from Alarm where alarmdate >= dateadd(hour,-9,#{start}) and alarmdate < dateadd(hour,-9,#{end}) and idnode in (select idnode from node where idparent=#{eqpId} and nodetype in (10201,10202)) group by idnode, alarmdate

select idnode as param_id, dateadd(hour,9,alarmdate) as alarm_dtts, max(case when alarmstatus > 256 then -2 else alarmstatus end) as status_cd, max(currentvalue) as value, max(alarmlevel) as lvl from Alarm where idnode =#{param_id} group by idnode, alarmdate order by alarmdate

select a.param_id, a.measure_dtts as event_dtts, a.value, a.max_freq, a.freq_count, a.rpm, a.sample_time ,a.scale_factor, a.frequency, b.timewave from ( select b.idnode as param_id, b.endfreq as max_freq, b.spectralines as freq_count, b.speed as rpm, '' as sample_time, dateadd(hour, 9, b.measdate) as measure_dtts, b.measvalue as value, a.ScaleFactor as scale_factor, a.rawData frequency, a.idmeasurement from MeasurementBinaryRaw a join Measurement b on a.idmeasurement = b.idmeasurement where b.measdate >= dateadd(hour,-9,#{start}) and b.measdate < dateadd(hour,-9,#{end}) and a.datatype=0 and b.idnode in (select idnode from node where idparent=#{eqpId} and nodetype in (10201,10202)) ) a, ( select a.rawData timewave, a.idmeasurement from MeasurementBinaryRaw a join Measurement b on a.idmeasurement = b.idmeasurement where b.measdate >= dateadd(hour,-9,#{start}) and b.measdate < dateadd(hour,-9,#{end}) and a.datatype=2 and b.idnode in (select idnode from node where idparent=#{eqpId} and nodetype in (10201,10202)) ) b where a.idmeasurement=b.idmeasurement

select a.idmeasurement as measure_trx_id, a.DataType as bin_data_type_cd, a.ScaleFactor as scale_factor, a.RawData as binary from MeasurementBinaryRaw a join Measurement b on a.idmeasurement = b.idmeasurement where b.measdate >= dateadd(hour,-9,#{start}) and b.measdate < dateadd(hour,-9,#{end}) and b.idnode in (select idnode from node where idparent=#{eqpId} and nodetype in (10201,10202))
mapper.delete: delete from measure_trx_bin_pdm where (measure_trx_id, bin_data_type_cd) in ( select a.measure_trx_id, a.bin_data_type_cd from measure_trx_bin_pdm a join measure_trx_pdm b on b.measure_trx_id = a.measure_trx_id where b.measure_dtts >= #{start} and b.measure_dtts < #{end} and b.param_id in (select param_id from param_pdm where eqp_id = #{eqpId}) )
mapper.select: select a.* from ( select IDPoint as param_id, dateadd(hour,9,ReadingTime) as read_dtts, format(dateadd(hour,9,ReadingTime), N'yyMMddHHmm') group_dtts, F5Amp as value, speed as rpm from TrendMultiple where idpoint in (select param.idnode from node eqp join node param on param.idparent=eqp.idnode where 1=1 and eqp.nodetype = 1 and param.treetype = 1 and param.nodetype in (10001, 10201, 10202) and eqp.idnode=#{eqpId} ) and lvl = 1 and ReadingTime >= dateadd(hour,-9,#{start}) and ReadingTime < dateadd(hour,-9,#{end}) ) a order by group_dtts, param_id

select d.nodename as area_name, c.nodename as eqp_name
from node b join node c on b.idparent = c.idnode join node d on c.idparent=d.idnode where b.treetype = 1 and b.nodetype in (10001, 10201, 10202) and c.nodetype = 1 and d.nodetype=0 and d.treetype=1 and b.idnode in (select param.idnode from node eqp join node param on param.idparent=eqp.idnode where 1=1 and eqp.nodetype = 1 and param.treetype = 1 and param.nodetype in (10001, 10201, 10202) and eqp.idnode=#{eqpId} ) group by d.nodename, c.nodename;

select IDPoint as param_id, dateadd(hour,9,ReadingTime) as read_dtts, F5Amp as value, speed as rpm from TrendMultiple where idpoint = #{paramId} and lvl = 1 and ReadingTime >= dateadd(hour,-9,#{start}) and ReadingTime < dateadd(hour,-9,#{end})
